MMASK_LEAD_EXPLANATION: To use this web app, your browser needs to have MetaMask.
MMASK_MODAL_MOBILE_BODY: Open or Install the MetaMask App
MMASK_MODAL_BODY: Install the browser extension for MetaMask
MINT_YOUR_KAMON_EXPLANATION: The Kamon NFT proves your membership of the HENKAKU community.
MINT_YOUR_KAMON_DETAILS: You can mint your Kamon NFT for 1000 $HENKAKU.
MINT_YOUR_KAMON_WALLET_INSTRUCTION: To mint your Kamon NFT, connect your wallet.
MINT_YOUR_KAMON_OPENSEA_INSTRUCTION_2: It may take some time for the NFT to appear.
MINT_YOUR_KAMON_DISABLED_BUTTON_HOLDER: You already hold a Kamon NFT
ENABLE_EXPLANATION: Enable Kamon NFT to access your $HENKAKU, in order to be able to mint.
FORM_LABEL_PFP: Your profile picture for the Kamon NFT
QUESTS_EXPLANATION_BODY: By answering this question you will earn 100 points, which you can exchange to $HENKAKU tokens.
CLAIM_EXPLANATION_BODY_NO_NFT: You will be able to claim $HENKAKU when you own a Kamon NFT.
CLAIM_CLAIMABLE_AMOUNT_0: But, you currently have no points to claim $HENKAKU.
SWITCH_NETWORK_MSG_2: . To use this app, switch to Polygon Mainnet.

QUEST.HEADING: Quests
QUEST.EXPLANATION_BODY: By answering this question you will earn 100 points, which you can exchange to $HENKAKU tokens.
QUEST.MINT_YOUR_KAMON_EXPLANATION: You can answer questions if you own NFT.
